item.title: Eddie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Billy Graham
item.description: "Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength." -- Billy Graham

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whatever you are, be a good one." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Franklin D. Roosevelt
item.description: "If you treat people right they will treat you right ... ninety percent of the time." -- Franklin D. Roosevelt

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Peter Stone
item.description: "In my many years I have come to a conclusion that one useless man is a shame, two is a law firm, and three or more is a congress." -- Peter Stone

item.title: Eddie add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "We must always take sides. Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim. Silence encourages the tormentor, never the tormented." -- Elie Wiesel
